snippet: Ivan Nova lost, snapping a streak of 15 straight victories, and Eric Chavez sustained a possible concussion in the Yankees’ latest loss to the Orioles.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat New York Yankees, 5-0. Photos (M)5
lead_paragraph: For years, the Yankees had been able to rely on their series against Baltimore to improve their record and pad their statistics. But the Orioles are leaving Yankee Stadium this week with two victories in three games and some momentum in the American League East. A 5-0 loss to the Orioles on Wednesday night brought with it a host of other unwelcome developments for the Yankees.

headline.main: Orioles, Unusually Hot, End Nova's Winning Streak at 15 Games
